standard_metadata.standard_description: Explain patterns in the number of zeros of the product when multiplying a number by powers of 10, and explain patterns in the placement of the decimal point when a decimal is multiplied or divided by a power of 10. Use whole-number exponents to denote powers of 10.

hints.content: When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.  Number | Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $8.18$| |$\swarrow\purpleD{8}$ |$.$ |$\swarrow\blueD{1}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{8}$   $8.18\times 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$.$ | $?$ | $?$

Number | Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $8.18$| |$\swarrow\purpleD{8}$ |$.$ |$\swarrow\blueD{1}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{8}$   $8.18\times 10$ |$\purpleD8$ |$\blueD1$ |$.$ | $\maroonD8$ | $0$
$\purpleD8.\blueD1\maroonD8\times 10 = \purpleD8\blueD1.\maroonD80$

When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.  Number | Thousands| Hundreds |Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $394.2$| |$\swarrow\purpleD{3}$ |$\swarrow\blueD{9}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{4}$ | $.$ | $\swarrow\goldD2$   $394.2\times 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$?$ | $?$ | $.$| $?$

Number | Thousands| Hundreds |Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $394.2$| |$\swarrow\purpleD{3}$ |$\swarrow\blueD{9}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{4}$ | $.$ | $\swarrow\goldD2$   $394.2\times 10$ |$\purpleD3$ |$\blueD9$ |$\maroonD4$ | $\goldD2$ | $.$| $0$
$\purpleD3\blueD9\maroonD4.\goldD2\times 10 = \purpleD3{,}\blueD9\maroonD4\goldD2$

When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.  Number | Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $0.62$| |$\swarrow\purpleD{0}$ |$.$ |$\swarrow\blueD{6}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{2}$   $0.62\times 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$.$ | $?$ | $?$

Number | Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $0.62$| |$\swarrow\purpleD{0}$ |$.$ |$\swarrow\blueD{6}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{2}$   $0.62\times 10$ |$\purpleD0$ |$\blueD6$ |$.$ | $\maroonD2$ | $0$
$\purpleD0.\blueD6\maroonD2\times 10 = \purpleD0\blueD6.\maroonD20$

When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.  Number | Ten Thousands| Thousands| Hundreds |Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $9{,}201.5$||$\swarrow\greenD{9}$ |$\swarrow\purpleD{2}$ |$\swarrow\blueD{0}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{1}$ | $.$ | $\swarrow\goldD5$   $9{,}201.5\times 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$?$ | $?$ | $?$| $.$ | $?$

Number | Ten Thousands| Thousands| Hundreds |Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $9{,}201.5$||$\swarrow\greenD{9}$ |$\swarrow\purpleD{2}$ |$\swarrow\blueD{0}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{1}$ | $.$ | $\swarrow\goldD5$   $9{,}201.5\times 10$ |$\greenD9$ |$\purpleD2$ |$\blueD0$ | $\maroonD1$ | $\goldD5$| $.$ | $0$
$\greenD9{,}\purpleD2\blueD0\maroonD1.\goldD5\times 10 = \greenD9\purpleD2{,}\blueD0\maroonD1\goldD5$

When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.  Number | Hundreds |Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $67.198$||$\swarrow\greenD{6}$ |$\swarrow\purpleD{7}$ | $.$ |$\swarrow\blueD{1}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{9}$ | $\swarrow\goldD8$   $67.198\times 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$?$ | $.$ | $?$| $?$ | $?$

Number | Hundreds |Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $67.198$||$\swarrow\greenD{6}$ |$\swarrow\purpleD{7}$ | $.$ |$\swarrow\blueD{1}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{9}$ | $\swarrow\goldD8$   $67.198\times 10$ |$\greenD6$ |$\purpleD7$ |$\blueD1$ | $.$ | $\maroonD9$| $\goldD8$ | $0$
$\greenD6\purpleD7.\blueD1\maroonD9\goldD8\times 10 = \greenD6\purpleD7\blueD1.\maroonD9\goldD8$

When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.  Number | Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $0.043$||$\swarrow\purpleD{0}$ | $.$ |$\swarrow\blueD{0}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{4}$ | $\swarrow\goldD3$   $0.043\times 10$ |$?$ |$?$ | $.$ | $?$| $?$ | $?$

Number | Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $0.043$||$\swarrow\purpleD{0}$ | $.$ |$\swarrow\blueD{0}$| $\swarrow\maroonD{4}$ | $\swarrow\goldD3$   $0.043\times 10$ |$\purpleD0$ |$\blueD0$ | $.$ | $\maroonD4$| $\goldD3$ | $0$
$\purpleD0\blueD0.\maroonD4\goldD30 = \purpleD0.\blueD0\maroonD4\goldD3\times 10$

When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.  Number | Hundreds| Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $23.2$| |$\swarrow\purpleD{2}$ |$\swarrow\blueD{3}$| $.$ | $\swarrow\maroonD{2}$   $23.2\times 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$?$ | $.$ | $?$

Number | Hundreds| Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $23.2$| |$\swarrow\purpleD{2}$ |$\swarrow\blueD{3}$| $.$ | $\swarrow\maroonD{2}$   $23.2\times 10$ |$\purpleD2$ |$\blueD3$ |$\maroonD2$ | $.$ | $0$
$\purpleD2\blueD3\maroonD2.0=\purpleD2\blueD3.\maroonD2\times10$

When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.  Number | Thousands| Hundreds |Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $450.07$||$\swarrow\greenD{4}$ |$\swarrow\purpleD{5}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{0}$| $.$ | $\swarrow\maroonD{0}$ | $\swarrow\goldD7$   $450.07\times 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$?$ | $?$ | $.$| $?$ | $?$

Number | Thousands| Hundreds |Tens | Ones | $.$ | Tenths | Hundredths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: $450.07$||$\swarrow\greenD{4}$ |$\swarrow\purpleD{5}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{0}$| $.$ | $\swarrow\maroonD{0}$ | $\swarrow\goldD7$   $450.07\times 10$ |$\greenD4$ |$\purpleD5$ |$\blueD0$ | $\maroonD0$ | $.$| $\goldD7$ | $0$
$\greenD4{,}\purpleD5\blueD0\maroonD0.\goldD70 = \greenD4\purpleD5\blueD0.\maroonD0\goldD7\times 10$

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the right.  Number | Tens | Ones |$.$| Tenths | Hundredths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $24.5$ |$\searrow\blueD{2}$ | $\searrow\maroonD{4}$ | $.$ | $\searrow\purpleD5$ | $24.5 \div 10$ | $?$ | $?$ | $.$ |  $?$ | $?$

Number | Tens | Ones |$.$| Tenths | Hundredths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $24.5$ |$\searrow\blueD{2}$ | $\searrow\maroonD{4}$ | $.$ | $\searrow\purpleD5$ | $24.5 \div 10$ | $0$ | $\blueD2$ | $.$ |  $\maroonD4$ | $\purpleD5$
$\blueD2\maroonD4.\purpleD5\div{10}=\blueD2.\maroonD4\purpleD5$

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the right.  Number | Thousands | Hundreds| Tens | Ones |$.$| Tenths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $1{,}378$ |$\searrow\blueD{1}$ | $\searrow\maroonD{3}$  | $\searrow\purpleD7$ | $\searrow\goldD8$ | $.$| $0$ $1{,}378 \div 10$ | $?$ | $?$ | $?$ |  $?$ | $.$ | $?$

Number | Thousands | Hundreds| Tens | Ones |$.$| Tenths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $1{,}378$ |$\searrow\blueD{1}$ | $\searrow\maroonD{3}$  | $\searrow\purpleD7$ | $\searrow\goldD8$ | $.$| $0$ $1{,}378 \div 10$ | $0$ | $\blueD1$ | $\maroonD3$ |  $\purpleD7$ | $.$ | $\goldD8$
$\blueD1{,}\maroonD3\purpleD7\goldD8\div{10}=\blueD1\maroonD3\purpleD7.\goldD8$

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the right.  Number | Tens | Ones | $.$| Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $49.01$ |$\searrow\blueD{4}$ | $\searrow\maroonD{9}$  | $.$ |$\searrow\purpleD0$ | $\searrow\goldD1$ |  $49.01 \div 10$ | $?$ | $?$ | $.$ |  $?$ | $?$ | $?$

Number | Tens | Ones | $.$| Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $49.01$ |$\searrow\blueD{4}$ | $\searrow\maroonD{9}$  | $.$ |$\searrow\purpleD0$ | $\searrow\goldD1$ |  $49.01 \div 10$ | $0$ | $\blueD4$ | $.$ |  $\maroonD9$ | $\purpleD0$ | $\goldD1$
$\blueD4\maroonD9.\purpleD0\goldD1\div{10}=\blueD4.\maroonD9\purpleD0\goldD1$

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the right.  Number | Ones | $.$| Tenths  :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $7$ |$\searrow\blueD{7}$  | $.$ | $7 \div 10$ | $?$  | $.$ | $?$
$0.\blueD7=\blueD7\div{10}$

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the right.  Number | Hundreds | Tens | Ones | $.$| Tenths | Hundredths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $620.3$ |$\searrow\blueD{6}$ | $\searrow\maroonD{2}$  |$\searrow\purpleD0$ |  $.$  |$\searrow\goldD3$ |  $620.3\div 10$ | $?$ | $?$ | $?$ |  $.$ | $?$ | $?$

Number | Hundreds | Tens | Ones | $.$| Tenths | Hundredths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $620.3$ |$\searrow\blueD{6}$ | $\searrow\maroonD{2}$  |$\searrow\purpleD0$ |  $.$  |$\searrow\goldD3$ |  $620.3\div 10$ | $0$ | $\blueD6$ | $\maroonD2$ |  $.$ | $\purpleD0$ | $\goldD3$
$\blueD6\maroonD2.\purpleD0\goldD3 =\blueD6\maroonD2\purpleD0.\goldD3\div{10}$

When **dividing** by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the right.  Number | Ones |$.$| Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $5.62$ |$\searrow\blueD{5}$ | $.$ | $\searrow\maroonD{6}$ |  $\searrow\purpleD2$ | $5.62\div 10$ | $?$ | $.$ | $?$ |  $?$ | $?$

Number | Ones |$.$| Tenths | Hundredths | Thousandths :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: $5.62$ |$\searrow\blueD{5}$ | $.$ | $\searrow\maroonD{6}$ |  $\searrow\purpleD2$ | $5.62\div 10$ | $0$ | $.$ | $\blueD5$ |  $\maroonD6$ | $\purpleD2$
$0.\blueD5\maroonD6\purpleD2 = \blueD5.\maroonD6\purpleD2\div{10}$
